name: Cure
description: A spell that heals minor wounds.
descriptionTemplate: Call the powers of nature to heal yourself for {potency} HP.

name: Fireball
description: Conjures a ball of fire to hurl at an enemy.
descriptionTemplate: Ignite mana around your hand and throw it. Deals {potency} fire damage.

name: Transmutation
description: Alters the essence of objects or beings.
descriptionTemplate: Give material form to the Arcania inside you. Transforms 100 Arcania into {potency} gold.

name: Barrier
description: Creates a magical shield for protection.
descriptionTemplate: Condense mana around you to put up a barrier that will absorb {potency} damage.

name: Slow
descriptionTemplate: Magically shackle your enemy, reducing its dexterity for {potency} points.

name: Rage
descriptionTemplate: Fill yourself with rage for {potency} turns. You deal 5x damage, however, you take 2x damage and cannot cast other spells.

name: Shadow Ball
description: Hurls a sphere of dark energy at a foe.
descriptionTemplate: Condense shadow energy into a sphere you can hurl into enemies. Deals {potency} damage.

name: Aegis
description: Summons a powerful barrier to protect the entire party.
descriptionTemplate: Call for heavenly protection and take no damage for {potency} turns.
